title: If you can remove 1 champion from the game,who would it be?
body: I would remove vayne first because of how she is so hard to kill when she is ahead.Champions like zed can still be killed 1 v 1 if ahead but vayne is just really hard for me.She turns invisible and next minute you are dead because she just one shots you.I know lots of you will disagree but hey this is just my personal opinion and I wouild like to know your thoughts about this thread.

replies.body: I would ban Taric because he makes me too wet.

leblanc. w mid q cast = instant kills

Is this doable with Mimic? Like can you W to gain distance, and R-Q? and cast Q mid air but still have Distortion as your mimic so you can get second proc with R? 

I saw Faker do it against C9 in like S3 but I just assumed they removed it.
yes but the slow to her w has made her easier to out play really if you got quick fingers.

> [{quoted}](name=Darth R2,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=XwnEBFqT,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-09T07:47:35.504+0000)
>
> diana burst op when ahead

True that,I was playing full tank volibear and she bursted me like I was a underfed teemo lol

I'm surprise nasus hasn't gotten a mention yet. Is it just me that thinks its annoying to lane against a champion that just stacks his Q never touches you the whole game and makes your laning phase so so boring.

Don't remove champions that snowball or are broken, fix them. Remove the champions that aren't fun to play or make it a lesser gaming experience for those to play against.

If I was given the choice and told I had to make it, it'd probably be leblanc.

I don't really play mages very much, and if I do it's Ahri or Viktor. Not much counterplay in LB's kit, WEQR on an empty lane or a good spot and you're dead with no chance to react. Maybe if you were Xerath or Brand and had reaction times of like .100 second you could stun her mid W and dump your combo in return.

I've had decent games against her with yasuo by simply E'ing through her so she doesn't get the damage from W off, windwalling so no Q's and then knocking her up, but at a certain point if she's equal in farm to you she more or less wins.

You can charm LB mid W as Ahri if you're fast enough, it takes concentration but is SUPER effective trust me.

Also, Kassadin, Diana, Fizz, Galio(lol), Lulu, Lissandra, Lux and Zed are all great counters to Leblanc.

Lissandra is another Mid Mage I need to pick up. She has great damage, excellent teamfight potential and great survivability/escape.

I've had good success with Ahri against LB, mainly due to going EWQ when she W's if the lane is empty. Most LB's i've played against are very aggressive and greedy :)

Well, Lissandra does not actually have great damage, she never had the highest in the first place, which was fine because you wanted the CC more than anything, but ever since the nerfs earlier this season, she does a hell of a lot less now. Don't get me wrong, when I'm in a team comp with Fiora top and Yi Jungle, I still pick Lissandra because we'll likely have almost no CC and you won't be lacking on damage. But apart from that, strong reliable hard cc, mobility, good teamfighting, good escapes, strong laner, strong waveclear, she's easily one of my favourite mid laners :)

And yes! It's not as bad a matchup as everyone thinks! BUT it's the patient LB's that you gotta be weary of ;) I fucking hate those. hahah

I understand Zed's concept on positioning and his Q's and I know how to land most of his abilities, and I do well with him, but something just doesn't click like it does with Yasuo or Kassadin.

> [{quoted}](name=ContactSupport02,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=XwnEBFqT,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-11-09T09:06:23.248+0000)
>
> Btw vayne is properly the worst adc in the game right now

Not really,played against this plat I vayne smurf,goes 2-0 then 1 v 3 in dragon wtf

The meta for ADC's now requires long range, or you're dead. Yes, a great Vayne player can destroy teams in smurf games, but I could easily go back to a lvl1 account, buy nasus and trash my way to level 30. That doesn't mean nasus is the most OP top laner, it just means people i'm playing against aren't good enough to counter him.
(remembers that new item that gives her more aa range every time she uses q...)
(remembers that it's one shot and you're going to have to get that item first, while being poked and zoned from farm)

(also remembers that it fully charges after a roll aa roll)

(also remembers that her w got buffed)

Wait where does it say that? Because it builds up like static shiv, and a roll aa roll isn't enough to build a charge of shiv unless you max Q first and buy boots second back, and even then jinx/caitlyn/tristana out trade her by that stage.

On top of that, you didn't address the fact that she's going to be zoned from farm by jinx/tistana/caitlyn due to the range of their AA's and abilities. Going to be hard to buy that item when you're 20-30cs behind.
too bad i thought you said "1 team" and I would pay to remove my team from the game
Blitzcrank. I just hate playing him or playing against him. Also the hooks from bushes give me nightmares.

I would remove LeBlanc.

Because she counters so many of my favourite champs, not because she's as broken as she was when point and click silence existed.

And that is why I don't want Rito to listen to me when I say I want something without giving a long 3 or more paragraph explanation as to why.
Riven
I'd remove Riven, OP when ahead and useless when behind, her kit makes her impossible to balance and if riot tries to balance her they cop a lot of flak from "riven mains".
Vayne.

vayne is too strong for how lazily she can be played but shes still squishy af. id remove yi or draven, they're on the same level but not as squishy and they have something to work around a potential attempt of an enemy to fight back
I wouldn't remove any champion from League of Legends because none of them are broken, okay yes some are extremely hard to verse after they go 3-0 so don't give them that opportunity.
